page.title: 20SCHOOLS and ENVIRONMENT
page.content:
{ Devonshire Park Primary School}in Prenton accepts children from 3\ to 11 years old. It has a nursery, and a language unit for pupils with speech defects. There are 330 pupils in the main school, 52 in the nursery, and 20 in the language unit. { Bedford Drive Primary School,}Rock Ferry has about 230 pupils aged 3-11. { Prenton High School for Girls,}Rock Ferry has about 910 girls aged 11-18.
{ ******************** With the generous help of many people and companies, this information has been compiled by the children and staff of the following schools: {************************************** {*}Oxton St. Saviour's Primary School{* {*}Prenton Junior School, Birkenhead.{* {*}St.Michael & All Angels,Woodchurch{* {**************************************
